# Replicando gr치ficos de Plotly

1. Utilice este Notebook para replicar cualquiera de los gr치ficos financieros de la gu칤a de Plotly (Ver 游녤 aqu칤)

```{python}
import plotly.graph_objects as go
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plotly/datasets/master/finance-charts-apple.csv')

fig = go.Figure(data=[go.Candlestick(
    x=df['Date'],
    open=df['AAPL.Open'], high=df['AAPL.High'],
    low=df['AAPL.Low'], close=df['AAPL.Close'],
    increasing_line_color= 'rgba(255, 194, 209, 1)', decreasing_line_color= 'rgba(251, 111, 146, 1)'
)])

fig.show()
```

3. Con los datos de los ejemplos en plotly (es decir, alguno de los DataFrame), trate de crear:
    a. Un gr치fico de caja.
    b. Un gr치fico de histograma.
    c. Trate de utiliza la funci칩n pandas.cut para crear 10 segmentos o contenedores (use la propiedad bin).

a.
```{python}
import plotly.graph_objects as go
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plotly/datasets/master/finance-charts-apple.csv')

fig = go.Figure(data=[go.Box(y=df['AAPL.Volume'], name='AAPL Volume', marker=dict(color='rgba(251, 111, 146, 1)'))])
fig.show()
```

b.

```{python}
fig = go.Figure(data=[go.Histogram(y=df['AAPL.Volume'], name='AAPL Volume', marker=dict(color='rgba(251, 111, 146, 1)'))])
fig.show()
```

c.

```{python}
import pandas as pd

bins = pd.cut(df['AAPL.Volume'], 10)
bins.value_counts(sort=False)
```
